arabic.title: بانو بانو
text: أتاريه مش كده على طول الخط
انما من جوه يا عينى عليه
واهو ده اللى اتعلمنا على ايديه
ده أكم من وش غدر بيه
نقطه ورا نقطه يا عذابى يا عذابى

english.title: Reveal yourselves
text: and the distracted one, stop being distracted.
it's not about wealth or reputation.
a book with a misleading title.
we tried the well-dressed, handsome guy
turns out he's not like that all the way.
the bad trait inside him conquered.
not one tear will be shed for him.
we met the manliest of men.
when you see him, you say he's the best.
it was him who taught us
conquest, oppression and the power of its effervescence.
turn your faces off me for a while,
how many faces have played me false.
drop after drop, oh my misery, my misery.
it reveals my lovers and friends.
makes me lonely while I'm young.
and love is away from its homeland.

english.title: reveal yourselves reveal yourselves
text: And the distraction one, pay atenntion
We have tried the handsom one who looks after himself
And with him we became close
Turns out he isn't always like this
The cheap trait inside of him showed
No tears of sadness for him
Reveal yourselves reveal yourselves reveal yourselves
And we knew the man among all men
From the outside he's brave and loyal
When you see him you'll say he's the greatest
But from the inside oh poor him
Disloyal and would give away hos parents
And because of him we've learned
Reveal yourselves reveal yourselves reveal yourselves
Turn your faces away from me for a little while
So many faces have betrayed me
And the wine colored grape juice
Drop after drop oh my suffering oh my suffering
Reveals to me my lovers and my friends
Makes me lonely in my youth
And the heart strays away from love
And love is far from it's home
Reveal yourselves reveal yourselves reveal yourselves

arabic.title: بمبي بمبي
text: جنبك وانت جنبى وانا جنبك ياحبيبى
ده الحياه بقى لونها بمبى بمبى بمبى
عامل فيه إيه رعشة حلوة حلوة
بشويش علية الحياة بقى لونها بمبى
كنت بهرب قال واقولك قال واقولك
اه ولا خدتنى بالقوة وريتنى ياروحى السعادة
ده الهوا والعشق مالناش فيه إرادة
كل مادا ندوب زيادة لما نبقى ملايكة بمبى
لما نبقى ملايكة بمبى بمبى بمبى بمبى
الحياة بقى لونها بمبى وا نا جنبك ياحبيبى
وياحبيبى وانت جنبى الحياة بقى لونها بمبى
بيت صغنن فوق جزيرة لوحدنا والعنب طالع
حلم ولا حقيقة الايام عندنا المهم نكون سوا
وكله على الله سقفة ونغمض ويلا
الحياة بقى لونها بمبى بمبى بمبى
الحياه بقى لونها بمبى وانا جنبك وانت جنبى
وانا جنبك ياحبيبى ياحبيبى وانت جنبى
الحياة بقى لونها بمبى بمبى بمبى

english.title: Pink.. Pink
text: When you and I are together, my darling
Have you seen magic of love doing what to me? Have you seen?
A beautiful shiver is like a symphony
My heart goes mad n dances ballet.
The joy confuses my eyes.. I see only pink colour..pink..pink!
I was hesitated between yes and no
But, you came to me....you took me by force to the new happy world
Love and desire aren't by our will
Everyday we melt more and more..
Till we become pink angels..pink pink
A little house.. On isolated island.. You and I...
The grape grows and the sea's scent fills the space..
Kiss me...Close your eyes you'd see even the darkness pink..
Pink..pink....life's pink as long we are together, my darling.

arabic.title: شكلاته
text: He met me at the agricultural
He told me " request (ask) anything girl"
and went to the place you went toالشكلاته ساحت

english.title: Shokolata
text: He met me at the agricultural
and the sun burnt meمقابلني على الزراعيه
and went to the place you went to
It goes tell him and it disappear
and the chocolate comes to me

arabic.title: مانتش قد الحب يا قلبي
text: منتش قد الحب يا قلبي ولا قد حكايته
ليه عايزني من دلوقتي احكيلك رواياته
مش كل كتاب يا قلبي بالحب يتقرا
وقولتك ميت مرة انا قولتلك ميت مرة
انا لسه انا لسه انا لسه صغيرة
اما انت عليك يا قلبي شوية اسئلة
عبلة وعنتر عملوه ايه علشان يقسى الحب عليهم
وحبيب ليلى اتجنن ليه وليه الدنيا غدرت بيهم
هو احنا قدهم  ولا احنا زيهم
مش كل كتاب يقلبي بالحب يتقرا
وقولتلك ميت مرة انا قولتلك ميت مرة
انا لسه انا لسه انا لسه صغيرة
بكرا يا قلبي تكبر والحب هتفهمه
من  غير كلام عينيه هتشوفها بترسمو
حكاية جديدة خالص من تأليفي انا
يكتبها الشوق بليلة ونقراها بميت سنة
لكن الي بتسأل عنهم علشان تتعلم منهم
هو احنا قدهم ولا احنا زيهم
مش كل كتاب يا قلبي بالحب يتقرا

english.title: Oh my Heart, You Can't Handle Love
text: Oh my heart, you can't handle love nor its story
Why do you want me to already tell you its tales
We should not read every love book, oh my heart
And I told you a hundred times, told you a hundred times
I'm still too young, I'm still too young
Oh my heart, you come up with such questions..
And every question creates trouble in my thoughts
What did Antar and Abla1 do to deserve love's harshness
And why did Layla's lover go mad2, and why did life betray them?
We are not a match for them, nor are we like them..
We should not read every love book, oh my heart
And I told you a hundred times, told you a hundred times
I'm still too young, I'm still too young
Oh my heart, tomorrow you'll grow and understand love
Without words, you will see my eyes painting it
And the story will start with a tiny word
A brand new story written by me
Passion would write it in one night and we'd read it in a hundred years
But those people you are asking about in order to learn from..
We are not a match for them, nor are we like them
We should not read every love book, oh my heart

arabic.title: يا واد يا تقيل
text: يا يا يا واد يا تْقِيل
يا يا يا يا يا يا واد يا تْقِيل
قَلبِي يِقُولي يانى يانى يانى يانى يان
ودا قلبه ولا يعانى ولا يعانى ولا يعانى
يا يا يا يا يا واد يا تقيل
ويقف ويقول انا اهو انا اهو
يا يا يا يا يا واد يا تقيل
ويقف ويقول انا اهو انا اهو
يا يا يا يا يا واد يا تقيل
يا يا يا واد يا تقيل

english.title: Oh, you cold guy (literally: heavy guy, means a man who doesn't show his emotions))
text: Oh, oh, oh you cold guy
Oh, oh, oh you who torment me
But my son, don't tire me
Oh, oh, oh you cold guy
Oh, oh, oh you cold guy
Oh, oh, oh you who torment her
My goodness, he has such calm nerves
I swear he's like a British surgeon
And how does he look at me - like this
And how does he walk - like this
And how does he laugh - like this
And he stands there and says "I am here, I am here"
Like the statue of Ramsis II
Oh, oh, oh you cold guy
Oh, oh, oh you cold guy
Oh, oh, oh you who torment her
Oh, oh, oh you cold guy
But then he replies with no emotion
And how does he salute - like this
And how does he call - like this
And how does he fight - like this
And he stands there and says "I am here, I am here"
The tallest man on the block
Oh, oh, oh you cold guy
Oh, oh, oh you who torment her
Oh, oh, oh you cold guy
But my son, don't tire me
Oh, oh, oh you cold guy

english.title: O Teaser Boy
text: o, o, o you who torture me (expression)
o, o, o you who torture her
my heart is screaming of pain
and how does he look? like that
and how does he walk? like that
and how is his laugh? like that
and he stands and says here I am here I am
o, o, o you who torture her
but then he replies with very little to say (expression)
and how does he salute? like that
and how does he call? like that
and how does he fight? like that
and he stands and says here I am here I am
the tallest man on the block
o, o, o you who torture her
